overview:
She is working a freelance blogger. She is primarily writing about current events and the points of SEO for E-commerce. Aside from the mentioned topics she is also writing about networking, small business a and local economy status. She is also sharing online references.

She is living with her mom in Rancho margarita, California and at the same time she finished her college in the same state two years ago. She working a freelance in order to take care of her mom. During week end she and her mom are walking along the beach or having picnic nearby. She believes that through spending as much time as she could for her mom is the way she can express her love for her for taking care of her since she’s a baby.
